video.title: Masha and the Bear
video.synopsis: Lively little Masha lives in the forest, where she has many wonderful adventures with her neighbor, a bear who used to be in the circus.

episodes.synopsis: Rambunctious young Masha stumbles upon Bear's house in the forest; Masha foils Bear's plans for winter hibernation; Christmas comes to the forest.
episodes.title: How They Met / Don’t Wake Till Spring! / One, Two, Three! Light the Christmas Tree!

episodes.synopsis: Bear and Masha do battle with a jam jar; the wolves' plan to kidnap Masha backfires on them; Masha ruins Bear's attempts to romance a female bear.
episodes.title: Jam Day / Prances with Wolves / Springtime for Bear

episodes.synopsis: Bear teaches Masha how to read tracks; Bear can't remember how he bumped his head; a magical hat grants wishes to Masha and her forest friends.
episodes.title: Tracks of Unknown Animals / Watch Out! / Home Alone

episodes.synopsis: Masha interrupts Bear's peaceful fishing trip; a circus tiger comes to visit his old friend Bear; Masha's constant phone calls wear Bear out.
episodes.title: Gone Fishing! / Stripes and Whiskers / Call Me Please!

episodes.synopsis: Bear tries to take care of rowdy Masha's laundry; Masha and Bear play hide-and-seek; Masha and her friends help Bear repair his home after a mishap.
episodes.title: Laundry Day / Hide and Seek is Not for the Weak / Home Improvement

episodes.synopsis: Masha ropes Bear into teaching her to ice skate; Masha discovers Bear's box of magic tricks; Masha becomes rivals with Bear's little cousin, Panda.
episodes.title: Holiday on Ice / Hocus-Pocus / Little Cousin

episodes.synopsis: Masha cooks up a huge porridge mess; Masha's case of hiccups spreads to all her friends; Bear makes a home for a baby penguin.
episodes.title: Recipe for Disaster / Hold Your Breath! / The Foundling

episodes.synopsis: Masha and Bear play school; after finding a piano in the woods, Bear gives Masha music lessons; Bear asks Masha to keep the hare away from his garden.
episodes.title: First Day of School / The Grand Piano Lesson / No Trespassing!

episodes.synopsis: Masha and her forest friends make a music video; Bear pretends to be sick so Masha will leave him alone; Masha discovers she's a chess prodigy.
episodes.title: One Hit Wonder / Get Well Soon! / Time to Ride My Pony
